mapper.select:
select businessCode AS businessCode , businessName AS businessName , businessPartnerName AS businessPartnerName , businessPartnerNum AS businessPartnerNum , businessPhoneNum AS businessPhoneNum , businessAddress AS businessAddress , businessStaff AS businessStaff , businessStaffNum AS businessStaffNum , businessStaffEmail AS businessStaffEmail , businessSectors AS businessSectors , businessStatus AS businessStatus FROM k4_tb_business
LIMIT #{startNum}, #{rowPerPage};
